opponent.label: Felix Argyle
opponent.from: Re:Zero âˆ’ Starting Life in Another World
opponent.description: Felix "Ferris" Argyle is a royal knight who serves Crusch Karsten. Talented in water magic, he plays the role of a healer and absolutely refuses to use a sword due to his morality on life. He enjoys teasing people about his feminine appearance, and has a tendency to speak in a cat-like accent.
